title: ChatGPT Tools Unleashed: A Professional's Guide
description: This course offers a deep dive into essential ChatGPT tools, focusing on the ChatGPT API, integration features, and automation tools. Participants will engage in hands-on workshops and real-world applications to enhance productivity and automate tasks in their professional settings. The course provides clear, measurable learning outcomes, such as the ability to implement a specific tool by the end of the course. Intermediate steps and checkpoints during workshops will be detailed to monitor progress and ensure the pacing fits within the 24-hour schedule.

title: ChatGPT for Business: Strategies and Solutions
description: This course focuses on business applications such as customer service automation and chatbot development, making it feasible within the 24-hour constraint. It highlights medium-level ChatGPT features like sentiment analysis and feedback loops, directly addressing the advanced techniques required by professionals while remaining accessible for non-coders. Participants will engage in hands-on projects culminating in a deployed chatbot or automated system, providing clear, actionable results and immediate professional value. The course will explicitly outline the integration process with existing business systems and allocate time for troubleshooting common integration challenges, ensuring clarity and realistic pacing.
